PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-09302019-06-22,  PS,  ,  ,  , 
ActRoyal Canadian Mounted Police Act
SubjectRegulations Prescribing Physical Injuries
PrecisREGULATIONS PRESCRIBING PHYSICAL INJURIES in order to strengthen Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) governance by prescribing a definition of “serious injury” in regulations; in order to clarify when the RCMP must invoke its obligations to initiate an external serious incident investigation as set out in the RCMP Act.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0260 Publication Date: 2019-07-10
AttachmentsAttachment
